title: SOLD: T210 Walsh, OKC, cool pose!
author: seablaster

posts.post_title: SOLD: T210 Walsh, OKC, cool pose!
posts.post_content:
For sale is a 1910 T210 of John Walsh of the Oklahoma City Indians, Series 3.  I've had this particular card in my collection for over 7 years.

The price is $SOLD, net to me, postpaid. Commitment to purchase outweighs any ongoing negotiations.   :eek:

Please contact me if interested or if you have any questions. Thank you.

[url]seablaster@yahoo.com[/url]

[url]https://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/seablaster[/url]
